website_summaries.verdict: A nice starter drone for indoor use. Take it outside and it may fly away.
pros: Very easy to unpack and use right out the box
The sensors allow it to work well indoors
Not much need for learning controls, it pretty much flies on its own
cons: Some users have complained about losing the drone when flying outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This drone is so much fun! No controller at all. You just turn it on, toss it up in the air and it flies around. It sense objects and avoids them so you can direct it by waving your hand at it. When you want it to stop, you just catch it is in the air. We've had a blast with it. For indoor use, it's great because it doesn't bump into anything. The one time we took it outside, the wind blew it away because it is very light and quite small, maybe 4 inches in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: justthefacts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: This was the first drone we had ever purchased. Set up was easy and instructions were straight forward. Our sons have been having a lot of fun flying this drone both indoors and outdoors. It is a smaller size, but has the same functions as larger drones, you can pair the drone with a smartphone app and it is great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Mayela Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This had my kids, 2 and 5 years old, running all over after it with tons of giggles. They play with it until the battery dies. Compared to conventional cheap drones at the hands of my little kids, this drone is less likely to crash and break with the sensors and no remote. The drone itself still needs to be handled with care.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Good drone without remote control
customer_reviews.text: The drone fit in my hand. All it need is charging and turn it on. You let the drone go, enjoy it flying around. It fly around dodging any objects it encounter. The only thing I would prefer is for it to have a remote control. Since no control is needed, you can’t control where the drone go unless you block it with your hand. To stop the drone, you have to catch it fast when it’s near you.
customer_reviews.author: Tung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality build
customer_reviews.text: The body of this drone is very low quality. The outer body feels like a body made of wires. But the technology is amazing. The drone flies the moment it is thrown in the air and detects obstacles well. My 3-year old totally loved it. The battery lasts for a few minutes. The drone has already fallen several times from 5+ feet, but I dont think it will last many more falls. Its a little expensive for this build quality. Update : After my son used it for a few more times, it is now showing signs of losing its sensing of obstacles. It hit the ceiling and hit the wall a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh Bantiya

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy flimsy flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It is so flimsy made that I had to be careful not to break just to plug in the charger. Have to rush buy another gift as I am too embarrassed to give this one. Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Prior

customer_reviews.title: great gift to celebrate with a child you care about.
customer_reviews.text: Novadays every kiddo likes drones! So many they see on TV. I like a toy that is realistic, educational, and fun for kids. These particular toy is very well made. color is perfect, not noisy when flying. Just a little colorful copy of the real one. I think this is a quality toy that any child would be so happy to own and play with. Also could be considered a great gift to celebrate with a child you care about.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia

customer_reviews.title: easy, fun, durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to play with and they absolutely love it. I bought them a mini drone with a controller in the past but it was too hard to maneuver. With this drone, you just throw it up and it starts flying by itself. My kids like to catch it and release it again and again. Battery lasts around 5-8 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnie N

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lot of fun and requires no technical ability to fly. Kids will enjoy interacting with it while it flies around the house. It does crazy stuff while it figures out where its at. Great until it needs a charge.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Suck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the great reviews. Well, I must have ordered something totally different. The never charged. Cheap plastic. Cheap, cheap, cheap. I can't believe I spent $25 on these things. I am returning this trash while I kick myself in the butt for buying them in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Dead Motors
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little item. Well made and I'm sure it would be a load of fun for the whole family .....if only the motors worked. They do not. So . . . . it is kinda hard to review something that doesn't work. I really like that little item, so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMohrSr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute little toy for my grandkids kids. Both my grandkids which are 6 and 11 months loved it. It doesn’t hold a charge for very long and my grandson is a little rough with it. So it’s broke in a couple spots but still works very well. Would definitely recommended for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.author: scoozie

customer_reviews.title: It worth your money...DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest piece of nothing for $40.00 I have ever seen. I got it for my grandsons birthday and I don’t have time to return it. I had to be very careful charging it hoping I wouldn’t break it, the thing is that fragile. It will not last past the first flight I’m sure. Amazon I am disgusted with you for selling this product!!!!!!!! I was forced to give a star but it doesn’t deserve not 1!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: The drone arrived on time but unfortunately it did not work. When I charged it lights did come on but that was it. The motor didn't run so it wouldn't fly. I'm giving it 2 stars instead of one just because the seller did a refund pretty fast and made it easy to return. Too bad. Kids had been looking forward to seeing it in action. I still want one but will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little toy for the holidays. Construction feels okay but the internal components are protected and it comes with extra blades and a screw driver. I couldn't figure out how to get it going and finally figured out that you have to keep it stable until the light turns solid green. After that you can toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: OK, bought two of these things for my Grandsons to play with. Let's first describe the Good points: they arrived as promised, they were the colors I ordered. Now.... The flight time.... After a charge they give a 5-8 minute flight time. What they didn't say is that is it... 5-8 minutes... never to fly again. Not just one, I could almost understand that ONE of the TWO that I purchased may have a "glich". Nope..... Both failed miserably. Go find something else for your kid... ANYTHING.... just not these
customer_reviews.author: James R Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone for my son. But when I receive it we play with my so and daughter. This is awesome toy. No need battery. It's charges via USB. We play indoor. Playing at night more fun.
customer_reviews.author: sazzad chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the best hovering toy ever. Very impressive in a dark room. Unlike other hover toys that crash when they hit walls, this toy will detect walls and move away. I’ve had this toy hover and fly in a room for its entire charge. The length of the charge is decent. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Billy K

customer_reviews.title: Fun, doesn’t crash into things, doesn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is a lot of fun! And unlike most other flying toys I have bought for my grandson over the years, this one seems to be indestructible. Finally a flying toy that AVOIDS walls, curtains furniture, etc., while surviving kidly abuse. Comes with a charging cable but you need to provide your own cell phone-type power supply to plug it into.
customer_reviews.author: PRM

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cheaply made so don't expect much out of them. The boys had them broken in just a couple of hours. It is kind of like buying tools from Harbor Freight, as long as you realize that you are buying cheap Chinese stuff and you better not expect it to last long but it should do the job for a little while!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SUPER fun Drone!
customer_reviews.text: Super Fun Drone! 7 year old grandson and the entire family had loads of fun playing with this toy. It really does work how it says! Runs out of battery pretty quickly though but charges again in about 40 minutes. Disappointing when it runs out of battery, but fun again when it is charged and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: BTMVR

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old grandson. He immediately fell in love with it and played with it endlessly until it needed charging again. Last week I checked it out and a couple of the spokes have broken from collisions with walls or furniture. This has not yet effected the performance, so he continues to play with it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Red Lodger

customer_reviews.title: this toy is tons of fun.  my kids love playing with it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very intuitive product - one read through of the manual and it totally made sense. very important that you don't skip the manual. When it's flashing red/green/blue - I find it best to lay it flat on a book, it seems to go back into hover mode immediately. One thing to be careful of... if your heat or ac vents catch it... you may have it bouncing off the ceiling until the battery runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Willey

customer_reviews.title: just ok. not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: the original box is tiny. I didn't aware of that until opened box. its ok. my kids cant have fun. cus no remote & size is like card. indoor a little danger. outdoor wind blow away. I have to use hand to close drone. this toy only for 2 yrs old. I have to return to get better one
customer_reviews.author: wanda001

customer_reviews.title: Kids had a blast
customer_reviews.text: Funny when we figured it out the kids had so much fun. Surprisingly how they have held up, used in the house best part was watching the kids laugh and falling over the furniture chasing these toys. Great entertainment. We bought more.
customer_reviews.author: Papa 313

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is obsessed with remote controls, drones, etc. It is smaller than I expected but should work well for him. I like that the propellers are Incased. Should make it where they don’t break nearly as easily as other drones or helicopters. It’s a Christmas gift so I haven’t operated it yet but I’m hoping he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is just about the coolest toy you can get a kid -- it hovers, bounces off your hands, and charges quickly. Though it's a light plastic, it's so lightweight that falling to the floor or bouncing off a bookcase doesn't hurt it. Don't step on it, though!
customer_reviews.author: ARG

customer_reviews.title: Looked like fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a four year old. It looked like it would be great fun. The first one delivered wouldn't turn on after it was charged. I returned it to Amazon and got a replacement. The second one didn't work either. If I hold the the on/off switch the lights will flash but the motor does not run. Giving up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for youth.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandchildren really enjoy this little toy. Lots of laughs and running around to get it to turn where they want. My only disappointment is it takes 40 to charge, that's OK, but it expires in about 7 or 8 minutes. The joy and laughter make it worth while.
customer_reviews.author: Joat90066

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely LOVE this this little toy drone! It is very lightweight so I was surprised at how powerful it is! I expected it to be difficult to operate but it’s so simple, all you have to do is toss it and it takes right off. Our whole family has had so much fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival, returning.
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed it, charged it up all they way. It doesn't turn on. I get a very quick flash of green light and then nothing...dead. Additionally, these are quite possible the worst product instructions ever on the planet! Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamadrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: There is no remote control. You are the remote!! Fantastic toy for every age in my opinion. Adults will love this also. Great family entertainment. From one person to many this is the way to go for Christmas or any other celebration gift.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: The product is extremely light-weight and delicate. It is well-fabricated with plastic, the reticular structure enclosing the for rotors provides a good protection. Also the noise is in a reasonable standard. The exact product has nothing different from the advertising pictures. I haven't test how long the battery will persist for once charge, while I guess 15 minutes wouldn't be a problem. Which would be an elegent way to start it. Plus the built-in sensor in the craft is sensible, which can give you a nice experience to dance it with you hand gestures. Anyway, I like this product
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it very fun
customer_reviews.text: I love it it just flies around by itself nothing complicated about it just fun to watch and play with. I will be purchasing several more for Christmas stocking stuffing
customer_reviews.author: Homeworks Media

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all the family!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son who loves this toy. He opened it straight away and figured out how to launch it after reading the instructions. After that the whole family joined in chasing the UFO around the living room (including the dogs) which was great fun, the UFO seems to avoid crashing quite well however it sometimes does crash however the case is slightly rubberized so it takes no damage. The battery lasts around 10 minutes and it comes with a USB charger, which seems to charge it in around 30-40 minutes. Great product, recommended as it had the whole family in stitches!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fun but takes some work to learn
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old nephew loves it... There is a learning curve on trying to figure out how to control it... Do not recommend playing with it outside due to this because it may fly away
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W*****

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a grandchild, charged it once...worked. Later upon opening as a gift it wouldn't work...tried charging again...still wouldn't work. Ended up having to buy a different gift.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to for my son, but photo is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Hours of enjoyment for my child. But the photo shows a much bigger item than what the photo shows. So don't expect it to come from UPS in a 12x12x12 box. But it is a pretty awesome little toy. My son is 4 and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kramykram

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: So much fun is super touchy and hard to handle but it seems sturdy kids have had a blast it's much smaller then it looked online but still worth it
customer_reviews.author: Smcnabb87

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience so far
customer_reviews.text: It is Christmas Eve and I decided to try mine before giving away the other two I purchased. I cannot get any of them to fly reliably AND the charge only last 5-8 minutes! Seems like a bad product for the price. I won’t be giving any as gifts and will give mine another chance tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 yr old grandson. Very good quality for the price and very easy to manipulate. He’s super happy with it and having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Z

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Sci Fi in the Living Room!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this drone, but it's great! Let it go and watch it fly. Works well in large rooms.
customer_reviews.author: SHANAN D BENTLEY

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old has had about 4 other flying things that broke with use. I think that this one will last. I've even accidentally knocjed it off of the counter a few times. I love that he can fly it safely with little help from me and that my younger children
customer_reviews.author: Strong Mama

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved it, and as an added bonus our dogs love to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: PaulaF

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: We got this on a lightening deal and it was so worth it!! My husband and son can be entertained by it for hours! My husband has never flown a drone before so it has taken him some time to get used to the controls and he kind of fought with setting it up at first. But for the most part we are very pleased with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable junk, Amazon should ban this product
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a week now flies up that’s it, junk, junk, junk
customer_reviews.author: WHS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but plastic is pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a xmas gift for grandchild. I opened and charged it up so it would be ready to go. The exterior is pretty flimsy so don't know how long it will last. Easy to control though.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grand son and it worked for about 10 min then had to spend 20 min repairing it dont think it was worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Bruce McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Very low battery life
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these, I got 2. One for my son and nephew. Haven’t given it to my nephew but my son likes it. The only thing is after a full charge, it lasts not even 5 mins before it dies. Probably wouldn’t have bought it had I known that. Otherwise, very fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not for long!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun for about a day or two! Spend a little more if you plan to use it several times!
customer_reviews.author: Neal R Seidlitz

customer_reviews.title: No fingers pinched
customer_reviews.text: draw backs short fly time kids chase it everywhere,does get stuck on ceiling
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Fun - until it breaks which happens quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun - for the first 30 minutes - then it crashed, the propeller broke and we can’t get it working again. We were being very careful with it and the crash was just a normal crash but it was too much I guess. Durability is nonexistent with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by the ease of flying. It has an auto launch/land that works well.If you increase the "speed" that will go down quickly. I would strongly recommend this drone to a novice. The cages around the blades work well to keep motors from getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Yalysher A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun....
customer_reviews.text: What a fun toy, I bought it as a gift for my nephew, but had to try it out. It will hover over different surfaces and can use a hand, magazine, and I used a laptop to force it around the house. It is rechargable as well, work the money just for the fun alone....
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Kids, in fact whole family loved playing with these drones. 15 min battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Kids, in fact whole family loved playing with these drones. 15 min battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Alvie

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: The drone worked very well but for only one day...Fails to maintain hover at all now.
customer_reviews.author: tomsack

customer_reviews.title: Powerlast drones
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile, child is 11, blade broke shortly after playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This was for a birthday party at school. It’s so cheap I’m embarrassed so we gave the kid $. Smh junk!
customer_reviews.author: John O Hollan

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Any age will love this little drone! My grandkids ages 3 to 19 love them!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Sensenbrenner

customer_reviews.title: Super easy for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Its simple you plug it to any charging cube. And just toss the thing in the air. My 4 year old chased it for hours!!!! Get more than one they a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey evans

customer_reviews.title: Basic Toy drone, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this drone for my 8 year old. We had a similar drone before but the bladeds were not fully protected as this one is. While flying something hit the blade and broke the motor. This is why we choose this drone, having fully protected blades was a huge selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Darling

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take outside!
customer_reviews.text: Do not take this outside! My six year old got it for Christmas, which he played with a lot in doors. Sadly he when he took it outside it flew away. He was outside with his uncle and when he tossed it up it kept going. It went out of sight and he came running inside to tell me it flew into outer space. The directions say it is for in door or out door flying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control, a safe and fun device
customer_reviews.text: My family loved it, easy to control and we are having so much fun with this little device. Specially my new born baby enjoy watching this and he similes a lot when it’s flying.
customer_reviews.author: vijay

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: One doesn’t work at all. The other one flew off over the house, and kept going and there was no way to stop it. We looked in the woods for an hour with no luck and my son was in tears!
customer_reviews.author: emily steinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Super fun! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have beat the heck out of this thing and it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Sayward

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Super durable. Kids love it. Banged into ceiling, walls, everything and still flying!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works way better than expected. Took it in the back yard, threw it up in the air and it hovered. Easy to pass around. I'm getting someone else one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: P. Butler

customer_reviews.title: GREGREAT mini drone and easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: Ienjoyed the mini drone when I received it, as I found out it was a drone very easy to figure out and easy to use for beginners. More importance think is my little girl is very excited on it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Neas

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a birthday gift for my 8 year old son. He has a Nerf gun and absolutely loves it. It may be necessary to buy another one, because there are more and more players in the house and people have to wait for their turn.
customer_reviews.author: Sharonda young

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 yr old nephew and he absolutely loves it and plays with his friends He’s able to maneuver very easily Prouder very durable
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fun mini drone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun mini drone that charges with a USB charger. It’s really easy to operate using only hand motions, no remote needed. To start it you just toss it up in the air. My kids loved playing with it as did the adults. It last quite a while on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: SEP

customer_reviews.title: This one is real
customer_reviews.text: No if’s about this UFO this one you can fly. Lot of fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: it ispocket size, and the battery life is very during considering the size.The propellers were encircled by plastic guards, in this way, it go fully protected even when it was crashed. Anyway,my kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Davila

customer_reviews.title: Works like advertised
customer_reviews.text: This drone actually works as advertised. My 6 year old has been playing with it for weeks. The only down side is that you have to wait for it to charge so I will be buying another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gowen

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to control
customer_reviews.text: It works like it says. We got it in December and its March and it has not broken yet. It was for my son who is small and has a hard time with controlling other drone remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: After using just a few times since Xmas, it will not hold a charge. Very fun, but very short lived
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It only makes another problem with kids. First it takes longer to charge then to play with. Second it just irrates the children more. Not worth 20 Bucks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a hit. I bought 5 for all of my nephews for Christmas. All different ages and all were very pleased. Parents enjoyed them as well.
customer_reviews.author: April Prins

customer_reviews.title: No remote, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!! No remote, this thing didn’t even get off the ground. It’s absolutely over priced. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: YaYa G

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts for about 3 minutes before having to be recharged. It’s very disappointing. I bought two for my kids for Christmas. They love playing with them but I wish they held a longer charge!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 years old birthday! Super fun right out of the box! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Have to recharge frequently
customer_reviews.text: My young Grandsons loved it. Think some of the older guys like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Bena0-0

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old son...he loved it! He was able to control it & make it do tricks the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Anais

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. After just a couple of flights I pretty much have it mastered and took it off the beginner mode. It also does some good stunts!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Kind of noisy but my grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Maracle

customer_reviews.title: Nice drone
customer_reviews.text: The drone was delivered quickly and in good condition. It is very easy to use and safe around kids. This is a birthday present and i tested it before putting it away and to be wrapped later for birthday. I think the little one will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Lashawnta M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for an older child
customer_reviews.text: Never have a clue what to get my older nephew for his birthday. His mum rang and said how much he has played with this drone. He loves that it doesn’t have a control and he can use it indoors. Great gift for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Feyisayo

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: The toy is not quite the size shown in the picture, but I doesn't impact the fun this little device provides. I bought one for my nephews but now I ask to play with it when I visit.
customer_reviews.author: Apprentice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drone for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I would say this is a very good one for a beginner especially to learn drone maneuvering. For that price it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Monk

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Waste of money. Please don't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Unbalanced. Wires came loose immediately. Dont trust this item. The seller keeps changing posting when negative reviews are posted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fellenbaum

customer_reviews.title: For my kids, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to play with, material quality seemed decent, light weighted and the detector is very responsive, lifting it into the air in an instant! Overall my kids liked this toy a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kiki c.

customer_reviews.title: Fun until it broke
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Easter and loved it! It was a definite hit and after three days of playing with it, one of the blades broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Goble

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The only thing it came with is the instructions. No Tiny screwdriver like I seen some one asked about in the FAQ and no charging cable. So there is no way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.text: It was fun to use but it broke quickly so we had to return it. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Doaks

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a young friend who was turning 8. He his having loads of fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids are still having fun with this. We love that long hair doesn’t get tangled in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B.

customer_reviews.title: This drone is the best
customer_reviews.text: Drone was bought for 5 year old. Had no problem with this item. Held up inside home. Everyone had fun with it. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaloo

customer_reviews.title: Totally user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding device for the price. Charges quickly and very easy to use. Two very young children used it immediately and got the hang of it in minutes. Loved and the adults present joined in. Great fun. Performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This drone is fun and easy to control. My kid like it.

customer_reviews.title: Supernice
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful flying toy for my kids to bring them back to my childhood.

product_meta.title: Powerbeast Drones for Kids,Flying Toys for Boys Gifts,Hand Operated Self Flying Drone for Beginner with Obstacle Avoidance,Auto Hover Flying Ball,Boys Toys (Blue)
feature_bullets: Throw and Fly: Turn on the power bottom ,the indicator light will flash at the intersection of red, green and blue .After 2~3seconds ,while only the green led light flashing, gently toss the mini drone in the air , it starts to self fly and hover immediately. It's the best "out of box " kid gift for age 3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10. Recommended for ages 7 and above; suitable for ages 3+ under adult supervision. Suggest to pay it indoor.

Safe and Durable Kid Toy:The mini drone made of non-toxic and PP material that are flexible,lightweight and has tough collision resistance.It won't cause hurt to your children and damage to itself by collisions.

Control By Gestures:When hands close to this drone,it will fly in the opposite direction.You can control directions or altitudes by your hands or gestures.Thanks to advanced Interactive Infrared Induction and hover technology.

Auto-Avoid Obstacles:Promptly detect surroundings and auto-manage flying leans,intelligently move away when it close to a solid object.Thanks to the built-in gyroscope can control accuracy and sensitivity to make balance,inductive suspension and collision protection,4 motor fast rotation to provide power to make itself 360°Rotating flying.It also won't fly out of your sight because it is able to auto-landing once battery is low.Perfect fan toy for indoor.
